mapper.select: select * from ( select * from board where board_category = 'notice' order by board_regist desc ) where ROWNUM <=5 order by board_regist desc
select count(*) from board where board_writer like '%'||#{search}||'%' or board_title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_id, board_writer, board_category, board_title, board_content, board_delete, board_regist, board_edit) values(board_seq.nextval, #{board_writer}, #{board_category}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_edit = sysdate where board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into post_comment values(post_comment_seq.nextval, #{inherit_post}, #{comment_writer}, #{comment_content}, sysdate, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select* from post_comment where inherit_post = #{board_id} order by comment_regist
mapper.insert: insert into reply values(reply_seq.nextval, #{inherit_comment}, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_content}, sysdate, sysdate, 0)
insert into comment_reply values(comment_reply_seq.nextval, #{inherit_post}, #{cr_depth}, #{cr_parent_id}, #{cr_writer}, #{cr_content}, sysdate, sysdate)
